titles.title: To amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act concerning the effect of administrative orders on civil penalty actions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

term.name: Federal aid to water pollution control

bill.summary: 9/5/1997--Introduced. Amends the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to exempt from certain civil penalties violations subject to administrative orders that occur at publicly owned treatment works utilizing innovative or alternative technology funded by Environmental Protection Agency construction grants which failed to meet design performance specifications during a period in which additional funding is being sought, or design and construction are occurring pursuant to an authorization of such funding, for modification or replacement facilities.
